Class Cubie

  • java.lang.Object
    • Cubie

  • public class Cubie
extends java.lang.Object
    Copyright 2017, Shoumyo Chakravorti, All rights reserved.

    Licensed under the MIT License.

    The Cubie class defines the attributes and actions of individual cubies. By defining individual cubies based on their position, colors, and the directions of their colors, a cube can be constructed in the Cube class.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Shoumyo Chakravorti

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cubie

        public Cubie(int xPos,
             int yPos,
             int zPos,
             CubieColor[] nColors,
             boolean isCorner,
             boolean isEdge)
        Constructs a Cubie object Sets the location of the cubie
        Parameters:
        xPos - the x position of the cubie
        yPos - the y position of the cubie
        zPos - the z position of the cubie
        nColors - the colors which the cubie will hold
        isCorner - whether the cubie is a corner cubie
        isEdge - whether the cubie is an edge cubie

      • getDirOfColor

        public char getDirOfColor(char color)
        Finds and returns the direction of a particular color on any type of cubie
        Parameters:
        color - The color for which the direction is being found
        Returns:
        the direction of the color on the corresponding cubie ('A' if color is not on cubie)

      • getColorOfDir

        public char getColorOfDir(char dir)
        Finds and returns the color in a particular direction on any type of cubie
        Parameters:
        dir - The direction for which the color is being found
        Returns:
        the direction of the color on the corresponding cubie ('A' if cubie does not have a color in direction dir)

      • getColors

        public CubieColor[] getColors()
        Returns:
        CubieColor[] the colors of the Cubie and their respective directions

      • setColors

        public void setColors(CubieColor[] newColors)
        Sets the colors of the cubie to those inputed as an array of CubieColors.
        Parameters:
        newColors - the colors that will be applied to the cubie

        Parameters:

        ncolor: - new color

      • verticalFace

        public char verticalFace(int x,
                         int y)
        Used to aid formation of the white cross
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the cubie
        y - the y position of the cubie
        Returns:
        For any EdgeCubie that is NOT in the E Slice, returns the vertical slice that cubie belongs in

      • isWhiteCorner

        public boolean isWhiteCorner()
        If the cubie is a corner cubie, method returns whether the cubie is a white corner Returns false if cubie is not a corner cubie
        Returns:
        whether corner cubie
